column5: But even in Heimmel's normal climate,
the plant can no longer survive...
(I don't want to give up, but...
There's nothing more we can do...)

My body just...acted on its own...
The Shining Wing of the Mitos appears
when Master Creha uses her powers.
Though, I'm glad I could be of help.
Is there something on my face?
I don't know how I could
No, I didn't... This is all
to how hard the two of you
as much as we can carry!

at the Garden, he rushed home.
